game.name: Ariel Princess Vs Mermaid
game.description:
The biggest fashion competition between Mermaid and Princess is going to take place today. They need your fashion advice to decide which girl wears the best look for this special event. Dress up your girls in mermaid style and in princess style and then decide who do you like the most! Does not it sound pretty engaging and challenging? Join Ariel Princess Vs Mermaid and be prepared to prepare the jaw-dropping looks for the both girls and make a decision who looks better in the end!

When you click the play button, you would spot a screen where you would see Ariel in two different options including in a mermaid style and in a princess style. There are multiple dresses and accessories to choose from. Firstly give Ariel a complete mermaid look and then move towards her next appearance. Dress her up with a nice colorful shelled bra and combine it with a matching tail, proper hair and neck decorations in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games!

Once it is done, make sure to give your lady a perfect human princess look. Choose an awesome hairstyle and pair it with nice dress, a pair of sparkling earrings and other needful accessories including a handbag, a pair of gloves, a tiara, facial mask and a fine crown! After preparing both looks, get ready to decide which girl outfit offers you more positive vibes. Good luck to make a fair decision over their looks and spot some more cool dress-up challenges! Have fun alone or with your friends, no download required!
